attributes.action: Meet personally with HH Dalai Lama on his visit to Britain in May
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To meet with his Holiness when he visits Britain in May and discuss the occupation of Tibet. To show this man that many people in this country care about his exile and disagree with China's inhumanity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
